welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Golden Glades, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Welcome to Golden Glades!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet operations and offers luxurious amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves both commercial and private aircraft.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport is reserved for private aircraft and their passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest, United, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta, American, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Alaska, Allegiant, and Frontier.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, British Airways, and Emirates.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with a time limit of 4 hours.
